entry.string: Approval Request (Manufacturing Admin Doc) Has Been Approved

delete after next method server start 04 09 09
Select r_object_id from mdt_qad_smo_qdoc where r_current_state = 1 and NOT m_review_target_date is NULLDATE and DATEDIFF(day,m_review_target_date,DATE(TODAY)) >= 1
Select r_object_id from mdt_qad_smo_qdoc where r_current_state = 3 and NOT m_obsolete_target_date is NULLDATE and DATEDIFF(day,m_obsolete_target_date,DATE(TODAY)) >= 1
